data.title: Biocultural Ethnobotany of the Zapotec Mountains of Oaxaca
data.meta_description: Life in the mountains of Oaxaca (southern Mexico) is characterized by high biological and cultural diversities; both are outstanding in both magnitude and importance and play a major role in the dynamics of the biocultural landscape. This chapter employs the...
